casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

June 17, 2011

[Cite as 06/17/2011 Case Announcements, 2011-Ohio-2940.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2010-1335. Am. Chem. Soc. v. Leadscope, Inc.

Franklin App. No. 08AP-1026, 2010-Ohio-2725. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Franklin County.

Upon consideration of the motions for admission pro hac vice of David W. DeBruin, Matthew E. Price, Matthew S. Heilman, and Lindsay Harrison, it is ordered by the court that the motions are granted.
